author: Rob Goldberg
title: Warriors' Stephen Curry Says He Was 1st NBA Player Tested for the Coronavirus
description: The  NBA  season was suspended March 11 after Rudy Gobert tested positive for the coronavirus, but  Golden State Warriors  star  Stephen Curry  was apparently the first player to be tested, five days earlier...
content:
Noah Graham/Getty Images
The NBA season was suspended March 11 after Rudy Gobert tested positive for the coronavirus, but Golden State Warriors star Stephen Curry was apparently the first player to be tested, five days earlier.
In an essay for Time, Curry e… [+1543 chars]
